Description:
ROOM, ROOM AND MORE ROOM!!
With an abundance of natural light, spacious living and ample accommodation, this outstanding residence offers plenty of room for the growing family. From the moment you step inside you will appreciate the flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. 3 BEDROOMS, 2 BATHROOMS, 3 TOILETS, 4 LIVING AREAS. Comprising of ducted heating, evaporative cooling & a split system, impressive kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances & dishwasher over looking the meals/living area, rumpus room, formal lounge/optional study, upstairs retreat, master bedroom with ensuite featuring double vanity, walk in robe & balcony, double lock up garage and much more. All this plus a MASSIVE undercover alfresco entertaining area providing privacy and plenty of space to enjoy all year round to go along with the side access perfect for storage of the boat, caravan or trailer. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including local schools & shops, shopping centres, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!
Insights: 37 Bowral Loop, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxuriously Spacious Single-Level Sensation!
Opposite reserve in the sought-after Lakeside Estate, this as-new residence presents a truly
exceptional family lifestyle opportunity with its intelligent design, premium inclusions & meticulous attention to detail - all on approximately 592m2 of land.
Beautifully appointed with nothing to do but simply move in and enjoy, the home's opulent
interior showcases 4 spacious bedrooms (extra-large master with dual walk-in robes), stunning ensuite, equally-opulent main bathroom & separate powder room - all with floor-to-ceiling tiles.
Cleverly designed living spaces provide the ultimate in family flexibility including a dedicated theatre room, separate lounge/retreat & expansive open-plan family/dining area
complemented by a gourmet kitchen complete with Fisher & Paykel cooking appliances, Ariston
dishwasher, ample cupboard space & large adjoining butler's pantry.
Ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm & video intercom, high square-set ceilings &
efficient LED lighting all add to the appeal, along with a family-sized laundry, stylish plantation shutters, soft-close cabinetry & stone benchtops throughout.
Stacker doors reveal an al-fresco entertaining area with parkland backdrop & backyard with quality synthetic turf, plus a remote-control double garage with internal entry. Exceptional lifestyle & location, it's walking distance to Highlander Park & Aitken Creek parkland, close to childcare services & popular schools as well as easy access to Splash & Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre via Marathon Boulevard.
Insights: 20 Mangrove Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Picture-Perfect Inside & Out
This freestanding single-level home, ideally positioned in an established Hamilton Park
neighbourhood, provides a ready-made lifestyle of quality & convenience with its well-
proportioned interior, long list of features & landscaped low-maintenance garden surrounds.
An environment tailor-made for professionals, young families & downsizers alike, the home's
light-filled interior showcases a wonderfully wide entrance hallway, large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, as well as 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes), spotless main bathroom & separate WC.
High ceilings throughout & plantation shutters all-round, the home also boasts a spacious
open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed kitchen with breakfast bar,
stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher. Other highlights include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, additional ceiling fans (all bedrooms), full-size laundry & efficient LED downlights throughout.
Step outside to a large al-fresco style entertaining area & private backyard complete with lush lawn area & established gardens, plus an internally-accessed garage (remote-controlled) & additional driveway parking space. A short stroll to parks & playgrounds, Grand Boulevard buses & Hanson Road Sporting Reserve, it's also close to local shops, childcare centre & popular primary schools, as well as easy access to Craigieburn's major shopping centres & the Hume Freeway.
Insights: 3 Goulburn Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
The Ideal Start!
Perfectly situated in the heart of Craigieburn with all amenities a short drive away, this fantastic home is perfect for first home buyers and investors alike. As you walk in to this well maintained home you are greeted by a large living area which flows onto the well-appointed kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and separate dining area. The home also showcases three carpeted bedrooms with built in robes serviced by a central bathroom including bathtub. Step outside and enjoy the abundance with a spacious backyard, which also features a drive thru access ideal for keeping jet skis, trailers and any other toys. Other extras include ducted heating, alarm ceiling fans and double car remote control garage. Enquire now and make it yours before its too late.

Description:
Style, Space & A Touch of Class
Perfectly positioned & flawlessly presented is this sensational family home offering a functional floor plan complimented by its stunning decor and manicured gardens. Meticulously maintained this stunning home is designed for easy living offering 3 large bedrooms, master with WIR & double vanity ensuite, front lounge which could easily be converted into a 4th bedroom, immaculate central bathroom, a vast open plan living and meals area is completed with a gourmet kitchen boasting stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and the added bonus of a large pantry.
An additional rumpus room provides yet a third living area perfect for larger families or those that like to entertain.
All of which effortlessly links to an alfresco setting providing a true indoor/outdoor experience.
Further features include high ceilings , timber venetians, block out blinds, plantation shutters, double remote garage, zoned refrigerated cooling, ducted heating, established front and rear gardens and a large shed 10m2 approx fitted out with sink, running water and electricity. All this and more on a generous 640m2 approx allotment providing a private rear yard offering great space for kids to play.
One inspection is all you need to appreciate what is on offer.
Contact: Domenic Campisi - 0412 777 372
https://www.facebook.com/domeniccampisirealestate/
Insights: 3 Canopy Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all. Just some of the comforts on hand include master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, well-appointed kitchen with stone bench tops & stainless steel appliances overlooking the meals/family room plus much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight surrounded by low maintenance gardens, under cover alfresco area, a double lock up garage, ducted heating and refrigerated cooling makes this the complete package. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates amongst quality homes & parkland, with all the amenities close by including schools, shopping centres, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long! Description:
Low Maintenance Home.. Currently tenanted until 7/3/20 at $1733 per calendar month.
This well presented home is designed to accommodate a low maintenance lifestyle and is perfect for those wanting to enter the market for the first time or an ideal opportunity for investors looking to expand their property portfolio.
Comprising three bedrooms including master with full ensuite and walk in robe. Separate lounge room and an open plan family room providing plenty of space to entertain or room for the growing family. A bright kitchen offering large bench space, stainless steel appliances and walk in pantry.
Conveniently located within walking distance to Newbury Primary School, Pelican Childcare Centre and local convenience stores.
Features include gas ducted heating, air conditioning and remote controlled double car garage with internal access.
Currently tenanted until 7/3/20 at $1733 per calendar month.
Photo identification will be required upon entering the property at the inspection times.

Description:
STYLE, SIZE & LOCATION
Sitting on a generous block of 600m2 (approx.), exclusively situated in the well sought after Aston estate and minutes away from Craigieburn Shopping Centre and local schools, this refined single level residence showcases impressive proportions and modern elegance providing the ultimate in low maintenance luxury.
A sense of light filled spaces and proportion defines this elegant home. Timeless in design and finish, the wide entrance hall featuring high ceilings leads through to a modern kitchen designed with a Caesar stone island bench of impressive quality, generous meals and family area complemented with a wood fire place.
Not a single shortcut has been taken to build and design this residence to the highest of standards. 90 mm Caesar bench tops, marble basins and quality window furnishings, just to name a few.
Featuring:
Master bedroom with a luxurious ensuite and walk in robe
Another 4 generous sized bedrooms, 2 with walk in robes, the rest with built in robes
Central bathroom
Modern kitchen with Caesar bench tops, 900 mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and a butler's pantry
Open plan living area with a wood fire place
Alfresco area with an electric fire place, ceiling fan, kitchenette with stainless steel appliances.
Low maintenance designed garden
Double garage
Laundry with Caesar bench tops
Refrigerated cooling
Ducted heating
Landscaped and low maintenance front & back yard
Security camera system
There is much more to mention, a visit is a must. Note: Photo ID required
Insights: 10 Style Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
8 Hollyhock Road Craigieburn - Brand New Home !!!
Ticks all the buyer's wish list
1. Land size - 350 sqm
2. 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & double garage
3. 15 mins walk to Newbury Primary School
4. Bus stop to Craigieburn train station at 15 mins walk
5. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria presents 8 Hollyhock Rd, Craigieburn built by Porter Davis in the prestigious Highlands estate & only a short drive to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Highlands Shopping Centre & schools.
This brand new home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior colour themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, higher ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all included in this beautiful home.
8 Hollyhock Rd Features:
- 4 spacious bedrooms, master will full double vanity ensuite and walk in robe remaining 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Well-equipped kitchen & stainless steel cooking appliances including 900 mm gas cook top, range hood, dishwasher, walk in pantry and island bench.
- Open plan living space comprising spacious dining and living area adjacent kitchen.
- Modern central bathroom.
- Spacious laundry
- Central ducted heating and provision for evaporative cooling
- Concrete perimeter around the house and security alarm
- Remote control double car garage and much more!
Call Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 now for further information or to arrange an inspection.
Photo ID must be presented upon all open & private inspections.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List:
www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Let Me Entertain You!
Calling this magnificent property home would be a dream, as you can't go past the location, being within close proximity to Craigieburn Plaza, Craigieburn Train Station, bus stops, schools and parks/recreational facilities.
Once walking through the home you will find a spacious master bedroom complete with a full ensuite and walk in robe, another two bedrooms with built in robes, formal lounge, kitchen meals area with granite benchtops and plenty of cupboard space, laundry and central bathroom.
Additional features include ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout, to keep yourself nice and cosy during the cold winter nights, or fresh and cool during the blistering summer heat. And if you were wanting to cool down further, there is always plenty of time to head to the illuminating solar heated swimming pool to freshen up whilst enjoying a BBQ with the family & friends under the spectacular alfresco area.
A double carport along with a double car garage & a massive shed complete this lovely home. With all the perks that you desire, why not make this home yours!

Set in an ideal and sought-after location in Craigieburn, this modern well-presented home has a lot to offer first homebuyers & investors. With a tastefully designed exterior you will be impressed with the open plan living which includes ducted heating, evaporative cooling & a split system, kitchen with stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops, dishwasher & walk in pantry overlooking the meals/living area, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite, main bathroom, formal lounge/optional study, single lock up garage with internal and drive through access plus so much more. All this plus a MASSIVE undercover alfresco entertaining area providing privacy and plenty of space to enjoy all year round. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates, this home really does offer a blend of low maintenance living, without comprising on space or comfort and with all the amenities close by including a very short distance to Craigieburn Central shopping centre, public transport & schools. You better be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!

Description:
Family Perfection with Modern Comfort & Convenience !
Be amazed by this wonderful nearly new family home which welcomes you with its touch of style, character & class & is ideal for the astute purchaser who loves to entertain the masses. Positioned to please, smack bang in the heart of Mt Aitken Estate within easy access to Craigieburn Central & public transport. If space, land & location are high on your agenda, then this home is sure to tick every single box on your must-have wish-list. With its free-flowing floorplan consisting of four bedrooms, master with walk-in robe & sparkling ensuite, equally stylish main bathroom, large formal lounge/dining area. Continue through to the heart of the home & experience an extensively updated modern kitchen with ample cupboard & stone-bench spaces, open plan meals flowing seamlessly through to a huge family room.
Step outside to experience the great outdoors that this home presents with a fully landscaped rear garden, which effortlessly blends nature & privacy all in one amazing package & is ideal for hosting the largest of parties or even perfect for kids to play until their heart's content.
Additional feature include:
Designer kitchen with tiled splash back, under mount basin, induction cook top, and built in steel oven
Walk in pantry
Under roof line alfresco courtyard
Fully equipped modern laundry with plenty of storage
Colour bond rear and side fences
Double remote garage with internal/external access
Low maintenance front and rear lawns
Ducted heating/evaporative cooling
Designer light fitting throughout
This property is amazing for all home buyers & investors alike with its brilliant blend of comfort & convenience, just move in and enjoy! Call now & be the proud new owner of this fantastic home.

Description:
TOO GOOD TO MISS.
Nestled away in a quiet location yet only a few minutes to major shopping, sporting facilities, schools, train and easy freeway access, location alone gives this home a huge tick of approval. Sparkling like a "new penny" from a fresh top to bottom renovation this one is a must see. Upon arrival as neat as can be, an attractive faÃ§ade and new gardens, inside the experience gets better, a great floor plan offering dual living zones including formal lounge, large and well-appointed brand new "Prestige" kitchen overlooking informal living & dining with sliding doors to landscaped back garden. Good size bedrooms (all with b.i.r's) serviced by renovated bathrooms including full en-suite to master, double garage with internal access and features including ducted heating and evaporative cooling. Finally your search for that new home or addition to your investment portfolio is at an end, this one surely is "too good to miss".

Description:
Welcome Home!
Bathed in natural light & located in one of Craigieburn's finest & most exclusive pockets, is this timeless & elegant family home which is sure to impress.
Embracing in character & immaculately presented with pride, the home's free-flowing design highlights 4 bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & ensuite), main family bathroom & downstairs guest powder room (3rd WC).
Versatile living includes large formal lounge, huge gourmet kitchen with expansive storage & bench space, complimented by an oversized open-plan living/dining area with stacker doors that effortlessly lead outside to a private decked pergola area, surrounded by an immaculately maintained garden space.
Further features include; 9ft ceilings, tiled splashback, heating, double remote garage with drive-through-access, front porch & much more.
Opposite St Andrews Drive Reserve, it's also close to Craigieburn (18-hole) Golf Course, Fairways Park as well as popular shopping centres, schools & easy access to the Hume Freeway. Amazing family lifestyle - don't miss this one!
